data.name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - Earthblood - Champion of Gaia Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Champion of Gaia pack includes:
- 3 outfits for Cahal
- 4 exclusive furs for the Wolf and Werewolf
- A nature spirit to help you in combat
- A unique finishing move
data.about_the_game:
The Champion of Gaia pack includes:
- 3 outfits for Cahal
- 4 exclusive furs for the Wolf and Werewolf
- A nature spirit to help you in combat
- A unique finishing move
data.short_description: This pack includes all the additional content of the Champion of Gaia edition.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 | AMD FX-8370
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7790, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 | AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780, 3 GB | AMD Radeon R9 290, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
